ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Set the default Sherpa data id

DESC.PARA: The set_default_id command sets the default id for the session. The default dataset id is "1". If a Sherpa command has an optional id parameter and it is not specified, the default data id value is used.

LIST.ITEM: id - a string or integer value for the default data id

DESC.PARA:
The currently default is returned by the get_default_id command
("ahelp get_default_id").
The default data id is set to "2".
The default data id is set to "source", then the change is confirmed.

BUGS.PARA: See the bugs pages on the Sherpa website for an up-to-date listing of known bugs.
